#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int count;
int z, sum[1000001],lps[1000000];

void computeLPSArray(char *pat, int M, int *lps);

void KMPSearch(char *pat, char *txt)
{
    int M = strlen(pat);
    int N = strlen(txt);


    int j  = 0;

    computeLPSArray(pat, M, lps);

    int i = 0;
    while(i < N)
    {
      if(pat[j] == txt[i])
      {
        j++;
        i++;
      }

      if (j == M)
      {
    count++;
        j = lps[j-1];
      }

      else if(pat[j] != txt[i])
      {
        if(j != 0)
         j = lps[j-1];
        else
         i = i+1;
      }
    }
}

void computeLPSArray(char *pat, int M, int *lps)
{
    int len = 0;
    int i;

    lps[0] = 0;
    i = 1;

    while(i < M)
    {
       if(pat[i] == pat[len])
       {
         len++;
         lps[i] = len;
         i++;
       }
       else
       {
         if( len != 0 )
         {
           len = lps[len-1];

         }
         else
         {
           lps[i] = 0;
           i++;
         }
       }
    }
}

int main()
{
    int t,q,h;
    scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
    char txt[10002],pat[10002],ch;
    scanf("%s",txt);
scanf("%d",&q);
while(q--)
{
count=0;
z=0;
scanf("%s",pat);
   KMPSearch(pat,txt);
   printf("%d\n",count);
   }
   }
   return 0;
   }
